title: Clean up JDK-8 related code
description:
Since Mockito 5.0.0 has JDK-11 baseline (🥳 ), we could clean up all JDK-8 code:

  • Remove Java8LocationImpl
  • Remove Java8LocationFactory
  • Check for any other places JDK-8 is checked for
  • Check for any pre-JDK-8 code (#2731)

@TimvdLippe I think this is a good time to clean up, what do you think? (I could take care of that).

Thank you!
